name: Processing ID
description: Codes indicating the processing mode for HL7 messages (production, training, or debugging)

values.definition: Message is part of a debugging system with detailed logging and diagnostic information
Message is part of a production system with real patient data and live operations
Message is part of a training system for education and practice scenarios

vendorVariations.epic: Standard implementation with strict P/T validation
vendorVariations.cerner: Supports all three codes with additional internal tracking

generationRules.realistic: Production environments use P, test systems use T, debugging scenarios use D
